function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Insufficient consideration of data privacy and confidentiality in new data collection methods","Impact":"Potential breach of data privacy and confidentiality, leading to ethical concerns and loss of trust","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough ethical reviews of new data collection methods, implementing strong privacy and confidentiality measures, and ensuring compliance with data protection regulations","Technologies":"Data encryption, anonymization techniques, secure data storage systems","People":"Research participants, data subjects","Owner":"Researchers, analysts, data privacy officers"},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of contextual factors in research findings and recommendations","Impact":"Misinterpretation of results, flawed policy and practice recommendations, and lack of transparency in research output","Mitigation":"Thorough analysis of contextual factors, transparent communication of findings, and inclusion of appropriate caveats in policy and practice recommendations","Technologies":"Data visualization tools, statistical analysis software, communication platforms","People":"Researchers, policymakers, practitioners","Owner":"Research teams, policy analysts, communication specialists"}]}
